remarks: Lemma for ~ iseralt .  A decreasing sequence with limit zero consists of positive terms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
statement:
iseralt.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
iseralt.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
iseralt.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : Z --> RR ) $.
iseralt.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` ( k + 1 ) ) <_ ( G ` k ) ) $.
iseralt.5 $e |- ( ph -> G ~~> 0 ) $.
iseraltlem1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ N e. Z ) -> 0 <_ ( G ` N ) ) $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
